solution_line_template: If the doubling time is {doubling_time_minutes} minutes, then after {total_minutes} minutes, the number of bacteria would have doubled {total_minutes}/{doubling_time_minutes}=<<{total_minutes}/{doubling_time_minutes}={number_of_doublings}>>{number_of_doublings} times.

Thus, starting with only {initial_cells} bacterial cell, after 4 hours, there will be {initial_cells}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}*{doubling_factor}= {final_bacterial_cells} bacterial cells
